alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Calcasieu; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 1:14PM CDT until September 08 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jefferson Davis Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Acadia Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Calcasieu Parish in southwestern Louisiana... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 114 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bivens to 6 miles southwest of Longville to near Reeves to near Oberlin to near Basile to near Eunice to near Chataignier, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Orange, Crowley, Eunice, Jennings, Rayne, Westlake, Church Point, Welsh, Vinton, Iowa, Lake Arthur, Iota, Elton, Mermentau, Fenton, Hayes, Moss Bluff, and De Quincy. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Texas near mile marker 880. Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 92. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 12. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
